hardwareSection.title: Hardware
hardwareSection.description: WINKHAUS hardware is renowned for its reliability and longevity. Designed in Germany, it offers a high level of security, functionality, and durability. The intelligent systems ensure perfect sealing and smooth operation of windows and doors.

slidingSystemsSection.title: Sliding Systems
slidingSystemsSection.description: Sliding systems are modern solutions for large windows and doors, combining easy functionality with contemporary design and energy efficiency.

typeGalleryCards.title: Tilt-and-Slide Systems on VEKA 70 or 82 Profiles
typeGalleryCards.description: Tilt-and-slide systems are built on VEKA 70 or 82 profiles, offering superior thermal insulation and easy handling. These systems are ideal for spaces requiring controlled ventilation and high accessibility.

typeGalleryCards.title: Lift-and-Slide Systems on Aluminum Profiles
typeGalleryCards.description: Lift-and-slide systems on aluminum profiles are designed for large openings, offering durability, thermal efficiency, and elegant design. They are perfect for heavy use in commercial and residential spaces.

rollerShutterBoxesSection.title: Roller Shutter Boxes
rollerShutterBoxesSection.description: Roller shutter boxes are practical solutions for shutter systems, providing protection and aesthetics for your windows.

typeGalleryCards.title: Single type
typeGalleryCards.description: Roller shutter boxes are designed to offer durability and seamless integration into the architectural design of buildings.

rollerShuttersSection.title: Roller Shutters
rollerShuttersSection.description: Roller shutters are efficient and versatile systems for window protection, available in manual and electric versions.

typeGalleryCards.title: Manual roller shutters
typeGalleryCards.description: Manual roller shutter systems offer simple and efficient control, ideal for residential spaces.

typeGalleryCards.title: Electric roller shutters
typeGalleryCards.description: Electric roller shutters add convenience and functionality, allowing automatic operation with remote control or smart systems.

mosquitoNetsSection.title: Mosquito Nets
mosquitoNetsSection.description: Plisse mosquito nets are the perfect solution for insect protection, combining elegant design with practical functionality.

typeGalleryCards.title: Plisse mosquito nets
typeGalleryCards.description: Plisse mosquito nets are designed to be easy to use and maintain, providing an effective barrier against insects.

hardwareSection.title: Hardware
hardwareSection.description: WINKHAUS hardware is renowned for its reliability and longevity. Designed in Germany, it offers a high level of security, functionality, and durability. The intelligent systems ensure perfect sealing and smooth operation of windows and doors.

blindsSection.title: Blinds
blindsSection.description: Blinds are versatile solutions for windows, available in two types: manual and electric. They combine protection with practical functionality and a modern design.

sponsorSection.title: Our Partners
sponsorSection.description: We offer a complete range of services for the production and installation of <PVC>PVC</PVC> and <ALUMINIU>aluminum</ALUMINIU> structures using profile systems <RAMPLAST>RAMPLAST</RAMPLAST>, <GEALAN>GEALAN</GEALAN>, <VEKA>VEKA</VEKA>, and <KURTOGLU>KURTOGLU</KURTOGLU>. In manufacturing structures, we use only high-quality hardware from <WINKHAUS>WINKHAUS</WINKHAUS>.

offerSteps.title: Consultation and Design
offerSteps.description: Our sales managers will help you choose the profile, glass, color, and hardware for your project. You will then receive a price offer with all the discussed details.

offerSteps.title: Measurement
offerSteps.description: Once the order is confirmed, the engineer will visit you to perform the final measurements.

offerSteps.title: Production
offerSteps.description: Depending on the complexity of the project, the execution time varies between 5 and 15 working days.

offerSteps.title: Installation
offerSteps.description: A team of professional installers will come to safely install your joinery.

aboutDescription: We are a company built on the values of a family business with the intention to produce PVC and Aluminum joinery at the highest level.

We work together to offer quality services, a good product, and to build long-term relationships. We believe we are stronger due to the complementary skills of our family members and the values we rely on: fairness, excellence, ambition, efficiency, and personal fulfillment.

The strategy we have approached from the beginning is one of natural and organic growth, absolutely customer-oriented. There is no problem that cannot be solved in relation to the customer's requirements.
